text: The Indian Fighter is a 1955 American western movie. It was directed by Andre DeToth. The movie is based on the original story by Robert L. Richards. Actors include Kirk Douglas, Elsa Martinelli, Walter Matthau, Walter Abel, Lon Chaney Jr., and Elisha Cook. It was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * Category:1955 movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Andre DeToth
title: The Indian Fighter
